# Sancassiano: Just mix it

Since 1962, we are specialized in manufacturing mixers, kneaders, automatic
mixing and proofing systems and sourdough systems.  
We deliver worldwide to our customers vertical batch or continuous mixers,
planetary mixers, automatic solutions with bottom discharge, mixing carousels
and mixing robots.

#### Essence

We are a team independent and specialized in mixing equipment. We are united
and motivated, with one goal: to satisfy your present and future expectations.

#### Our History

Since 1962, we are specialized in mixers, kneaders and automatic mixing
systems. We deliver worldwide to our customers vertical batch or ...

#### Video

The most innovative company in our sector with more than 25 patents and  
the highest number of exclusive mixing solutions.

### Mixing Technologies

## Hydra

Higher dough hydration, lower dough temperature, delicate with inclusions,
energy saving.

## Kryos

A new solution to keep under control your mixing parameters.

## Revo

For biscuits, crackers, thick batters and products with no gluten development.

## Planetary Mixers

Bridge Shape

Industrial planetary mixer in its traditional version

## Planetary Mixers

C-Shape

Unique oil free driving system with independent control of the scraper and
tools’ speed.

## Spiral Mixers

Traditional mixing technology re-designed to improve the standards with single
or double spiral.

## Fork Mixer

Low intensity, delicate mixing technology

## Twin arm mixer

Traditional mixing technology

## GER

Smart elevator

In a small footprint, independent lifting and tilting movements, up to
dedicated programmable cycles

## Liquid ferment

Delicate handling system

## Vigor

A leap forward in double tool mixing technology. Strong, flexible and ductile
Modern design Oil-Free transmission Patented phase control

### Industrial Solutions

#### for automated productions

## Complex automatic Systems

Very long fermenting time, with complex mixing cycle. Space-saving solutions
with multiple level Robots. Integration of multiple automatic mixing systems
and technology to reproduce automatically your very special mixing process.

## Liquid ferment

Delicate handling system

## Continuous mixer

The only continuous mixer with a scientifically constant dough quality
control. Very high production rate. Flexibility (1 to 5) in production per
hour and in mixing intensity.

## Robot

Control of the dough quality through the complete mixing and resting process.
Flexible recipe programming. Very fast moving of the Robot for a very short
cycle time. Space saving thanks to our innovative solutions.

## Carousel

Shortest cycle time, easy dosing of big ingredients, full automatic. Very high
production rate in a small footprint. Automatic washing of bowls and mixers
available. Constant control of dough quality. Stress-free dumping of dough
thanks to our patented EG Elevator/tilter.

## Bottom Discharge

Compact, efficient and cost-saving automatic system. Easy sanitation (also
automatic), with innovative, patented opening of the bowl for discharge.
Available in multiple configurations according to the production needs.
Constant control of dough quality.

### About Sancassiano

**Since 1962, we are specialized in mixers, kneaders and automatic mixing
systems.** We deliver worldwide to our customers vertical batch or continuous
mixers, planetary mixers, Revo, Kryos, automatic solutions with bottom
discharge, mixing carousels and mixing robots. In 2010, we introduced the
Genesi mixer and kneader family, a revolution that sets new standards for
industrial bakery as well as for artisan bakery. Our Genesi is available as
single spiral, double spiral (double force), Hydra, Revo, Kryos, planetary
mixer, twin arm mixer, fork mixer.

  

# Sancassiano S.p.a.

Via C. Cavallotto, 8 – 12060 Roddi d’Alba (CN) Italy  
Tel. +39 0173.280.324 – Fax. +39 0173.615.211  
Email: info@sancassiano.com  
P.IVA IT 00189480049 – Cookie policy
